      • getMudfilepath

        public static String getMudfilepath()

      • getDescriptionOfMoney

        public static String getDescriptionOfMoney(int aValue)
        Returns the amount of money in gold coins, silver coins and theCopper coins.
        • 1 silver = 10 copper
        • 1 gold = 10 silver
        Returns:
        String description of the amount of money, for example 320 will be translated as "3 gold coins, 2 silver coins". Returns "no money" if no money is present.

      • getDescriptionOfItem

        public static String getDescriptionOfItem(String adject1,
                          String adject2,
                          String adject3,
                          String noun,
                          boolean with_a_or_an)
        get a description based on the adjectives and the noun.
        Parameters:
        adject1 - String containing the first adjective.
        adject2 - String containing the second adjective.
        adject3 - String containing the third adjective.
        noun - String containing the noun.
        with_a_or_an - indicates if the word should include an a or an an.
        Returns:
        String containing the description in the format: "an/a [adject1], [adject2], [adject3] [noun]".

      • isVowel

        public static boolean isVowel(char aChar)
        Returns whether or not a character is a vowel.
        Parameters:
        aChar - the character to check
        Returns:
        boolean which is true if the character is a vowel.

      • addInventory

        public static void addInventory(Set<Item> set,
                StringBuilder builder)
        Adds a descriptive set of the items to the string builder.
        Parameters:
        set - a set of items to be described.
        builder - the builder to append to. Should not be null.

      • addShopkeeperList

        public static void addShopkeeperList(Set<Item> set,
                     StringBuilder builder)
        Adds a descriptive set of the items and their buy/sell price to the string builder.
        Parameters:

        builder - the builder to append to. Should not be null.

      • setFilters

        public static void setFilters(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
              Filter activePersonFilter)
        Turns the filters on or off.
        Parameters:
        entityManager - The entity manager to set the filters.
        activePersonFilter - the active person filter. Means, if it is on, any search for persons will only find active persons.

      • getSundays

        public static Date getSundays()

        Retrieves the date of the last Sunday, compared to now.

        So, if today is Wednesday, 12-12-2010, 13:00:00 hours, this would return Saturday, 08-12-2010, 00:00:00 hours (midnight).

        Returns:
        the Date of last Sunday morning.
